short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate theme shades based on selected color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This shade generator extension simplifies the process of color selection and shade generation for designers and developers using Chakra UI, Tailwind, or other UI systems. Users can easily pick any color from their screen and generate shades that can be copied and pasted directly into theme files.
